javadoc: Wrapper for Ghidra code to find images (and maybe other artifacts later) in a program

methods.name: <init>

params.name: bytes
params.comment: the bytes of the potential program to be examined.

throws.comment: if any exception occurs while processing the bytes.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: file
params.comment: file object containing the bytes to be examined.

throws.comment: if any exception occurs while processing the bytes.

methods.javadoc: Returns a string indication the program format. i.e. PE, elf, raw
methods.name: getType
methods.comment: Returns a string indication the program format. i.e. PE, elf, raw

methods.javadoc:
Returns a list of byte[] containing image data.  The bytes will be either a png, a gif, or
 a bitmap
methods.name: getImages
methods.comment:
Returns a list of byte[] containing image data.  The bytes will be either a png, a gif, or
 a bitmap

name: ProgramExaminer
comment: Wrapper for Ghidra code to find images (and maybe other artifacts later) in a program
